comments: T_8 is the unique weight = -6 normalized meromorphic modular form for SL(2,Z) with all poles at infinity.
references: C.L. Siegel, Advanced Analytic Number Theory,Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, Bombay, 1980, pp. 249-268.
prog: (PARI) {a(n)=local(A); if(n<-1, 0, n++; A=x*O(x^n); polcoeff( sum(k=1, n, -504*sigma(k,5)*x^k, 1+A)/eta(x+A)^24, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 30 2006 */
author: Barry Brent (barryb(AT)primenet.com)
